quote: I get angry when women disavow feminism and shun the feminist label but say they support all the advances born of feminism because I see a disconnect that does not need to be there.
quote_letters: I GET ANGRY WHEN WOMEN DISAVOW FEMINISM AND SHUN THE FEMINIST LABEL BUT SAY THEY SUPPORT ALL THE ADVANCES BORN OF FEMINISM BECAUSE I SEE A DISCONNECT THAT DOES NOT NEED TO BE THERE
